edu.ncsu.csc216.movie_inventory

Class MovieInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.movie_inventory.MovieInventory

  • public class MovieInventory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for organizing the movies by adding, removing, and listing items that are in the movie collection
    Version:
    1.0 (January 16, 2015)
    Author:
    Adams Ombonga (amombong) [Code Modified from CSC 216 Staff Tutorial]

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MovieInventory()
      Method used to initialize the movie array with the appropriate suze

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addMovie(Movie m)
      Returns true if the Movie can be added to the inventory.
      void exitProgram()
      Method used to exit the program
      java.lang.String listMovies()
      Method used to list the movies in the collection, if the collection index does not contain a movie or is null, then that entry is saved as Empty.
      boolean remMovie(java.lang.String title)
      Returns true if the Movie can be removed from the inventory.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MovieInventory

        public MovieInventory()
        Method used to initialize the movie array with the appropriate suze

    • Method Detail

      • listMovies

        public java.lang.String listMovies()
        Method used to list the movies in the collection, if the collection index does not contain a movie or is null, then that entry is saved as Empty.
        Returns:
        s, String containing the list of movies in the collection

      • addMovie

        public boolean addMovie(Movie m)
        Returns true if the Movie can be added to the inventory. If the Movie is a duplicate or if there is no more space, the method returns false.
        Parameters:
        m - Movie to add to the inventory
        Returns:
        true if the Movie can be added to the inventory

      • remMovie

        public boolean remMovie(java.lang.String title)
        Returns true if the Movie can be removed from the inventory. If the Movie is not in the inventory then the method returns false.
        Parameters:
        title - user input title to be removed from the inventory
        Returns:
        removed true if the Movie can be removed to the inventory

      • exitProgram

        public void exitProgram()
        Method used to exit the program
